name: Minimal Teal on Dark
description: Clears out the cruft on thesaurus.com, light on dark. Edit the values in the filter rule on html to change the color and feel. This is aggressive about cutting everything out except the most basic thesaurus info. No example sentences, no "try these synonyms in your sentence widget" and of course no quiz, no word of the day, etc. Last updated May 2021.

additional_info:
